Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Harlem (Forest Park Branch) to Forest Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Harlem (Forest Park Branch) to Forest Park.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
